post.extended: A nice simple example of responding to the pdf format using rails rest-fulness.
A very impressive calendar widget in terms of functionality.

post.tag: rubyonrails plugins railstips twitter facebook flickr microformats gmail
post.extended: This code, extracted from the Rails codebase of dopplr.com, extends your User model with methods to pull in social network information from sites such as GMail, Twitter, Flickr, Facebook and any site supporting appropriate Microformats.
